attributes.action: Option to Leave the EU with No Deal must remain available
attributes.additional_details: An option to "Leave the EU with No Deal" must remain available under all circumstances including being an option on any second Referendum or so called Peoples Vote (if this situation arises).
attributes.background: A proposal to block a "Leaving the EU with No Deal" option has been proposed by Remain backing MPs. This is not acceptable to the majority of the electorate that voted to Leave the EU in the 2016 Referendum.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the UK Government or Parliament to take specific action.

We aren't sure what action you would like the UK Government or Parliament to take.

You might like to sign this petition instead:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/229963
